description: A Fully Async-based backend for Code Inbox built using FastAPI, ODMantic, MongoDB, Deta, and friends.

env.description: This is the user name you'll be creating for remote accesses.
The corresponding password for that user.
Your remote MongoDB server's domain name.
The name of the database you want to access, in our case, the `shop` database.
Comma separated urls of the deployed client.
This environment variable defines the debug level.`` means production. `info` to access the docs.

name: code-inbox
